title: Best Quotes of Week: Dunhill Links
headline: Best Quotes of Week: Dunhill Links
description: Bill Murray on breaking into Padraig Harrington's room, Rory McIlroy on his wild night, Tom Watson on Phil's dis, Steve Williams on getting his old job back and Johnny Miller on the best iron player he's ever seen.
short_headline: Best Quotes of Week: Dunhill Links
page_title: Best Quotes of Week: Dunhill Links
slug: Best Quotes of Week: Dunhill Links
body: Bill Murray on breaking into Padraig Harrington's room, Rory McIlroy on his wild night, Tom Watson on Phil's dis, Steve Williams on getting his old job back and Johnny Miller on the best iron player he's ever seen.
